function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic transcends borders","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-border transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of cross-border collaboration and communication on public health measures","Technologies":"Digital health tools for cross-border tracking and monitoring","People":"General public, travelers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments"},{"Description":"Stalled progress on major measures announced in the European Green Deal (EGD)","Impact":"Delay in achieving carbon-neutral continent target by 2050","Mitigation":"Revisiting and accelerating the implementation of EGD measures","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, emissions reduction technologies","People":"EU policymakers, environmental organizations","Owner":"European Commission, Member States"},{"Description":"Need for greater integration and stronger EU-level institutions for COVID-19 response","Impact":"Inadequate coordination and governance of pandemic response","Mitigation":"Enhanced collaboration and coordination among EU member states and institutions","Technologies":"Data sharing and analysis platforms, collaborative decision-making tools","People":"EU policymakers, public health authorities, healthcare professionals","Owner":"European Union, EU member states"}]}
